name: BABYN YAR HOLOCAUST MEMORIAL CENTER
description: Non-governmental organization to commemorate the victims of the Babyn Yar tragedy.
sampleDescriptions: Introduction of Babyn Yar Holocaust Memorial Center to policymakers and discussion of potential bipartisan resolution.
